item.description:
Hike the Blue Hills and come for a beer after at the Sam Adams Brewery tour in Jamaica Plain. We will go to a local bar or restaurant after the tour.

We always get a big turnout and lots of people new to Wedeln Outdoor Club.  We will likely break into 2 hiking groups to avoid over-crowding the trails.

Moderate group - easy pace, likely distance is 4 miles.  

Advanced Group - fast pace, about 7miles

Both hikes will have some steep terrain with great views of Boston and the suburbs.

Final directions and update will come later. When you reply please let me know if you will attend both the hike and the Sam Adam Brewery Tour.

--------------

This hike will be one of a series of hikes the Wedeln Ski and Outdoor Club will lead in May. The grand finale will be a Memorial Day weekend of hiking up in the White Mountains.  Get in summer shape and meet some new people.
item.how_to_find_us: We will have a large broup of hikers, look in parking lot close to road.
item.name: Blue Hill Hike & Sam Adam Tour
